chinese: Hi Sharon? 我是Debbie. Hi.
english: Hi Sharon? It's Debbie. Hi.

chinese: 你要休假吗 这个夏天?
english: Are you taking a vacation this summer?

chinese: 我正在试着计划Dean 的告别派对.
english: I'm trying to plan Dean's going-away party.

chinese: OK.所以你8月10号到8月17号不在.
english: OK. So you're away from August 10th to August 17th.

chinese: 谢谢. 我会让你知道计划是什么的.
english: Thanks. I'll let you know what the plans are.

chinese: So Simon, 你会在8月底离开.
english: So Simon, you'll be away in late August,

chinese: 但不会很久.
english: but not for long.

chinese: 你知道有多久吗?
english: Do you know how long?

chinese: OK. 谢谢.
english: OK. Thanks.

chinese: Hi Wendy. 是我.
english: Hi Wendy. It's me.

chinese: 你30号会从科德角(Cape)回来吗?
english: Will you be back from the Cape by the 30th?

chinese: 太好了.Hey, 我有没有告诉你James...
english: Great. Hey, did I tell you what James...

chinese: 你会回来上班 在9月4号.
english: You'll be back at work on September 4th.

chinese: 谢谢 William.
english: Thanks William.

chinese: 我会让你知道我们要做些什么.
english: I'll let you know what we're doing.

chinese: Kevin.Kevin.
english: Kevin. Kevin.

chinese: 我没有意识到你没有假期 直到11月份.
english: I didn't realize you don't get a vacation until November.

chinese: 我很抱歉我提起它.
english: I'm sorry I brought it up.

chinese: 所以你会干什么 在9月6号?
english: So what are you doing on September 6th?

chinese: Uh huh.Kevin. 你可不许告诉Dean.
english: Uh huh. Kevin. Don't you dare tell Dean.
